comment: The main text box contains vertically aligned Chinese characters within a black-bordered rectangular frame. The text appears to be printed in traditional vertical format, with columns from right to left. Some characters are faded or partially obscured, especially on the left side. On the far right margin, there is smaller text indicating "小字三" (small character three), "言文十二" (speech/writing twelve), and "陸安" (Lu An) at the bottom, likely denoting section or page information.
